experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern
experiences.subtitle: Meta
workDescription: Built a common library for Instagram Android and Facebook Android using java apps that provides user clicks and navigation related metadata and implemented it in IG and FB Android navigation chain.
Fixed gaps in media id coverage IG android collaborative posts and explore feed posts and increased coverage from 16% to 78% and fixed content calculation using Python and SQL.
Participated in Company Hackathon to build “Oops likes on IG” – a feature to prevent accidental likes on IG.

experiences.title: Interim Engineering Intern
experiences.subtitle: Qualcomm
workDescription: Collaborated with the DTCO Global team to develop Test chip for new Technology nodes.
Automated RTL generation for Ring oscillators for different tech nodes with different configuration.
Setup and Run Synthesis Flow for the new design and new nodes with various Synthesis tools.
Setup formal Verification Flow for the synthesized netlist.

experiences.title: Research Intern
experiences.subtitle: IIIT Hyderabad
workDescription: •	Developed an application (in Java) using the DKPro library to automatically solve multiple choice reading comprehension questions. Using text similarity and textual entailment measures, it   obtained the 2nd best score in the CLEF Entrance Exams competition
